hadiths.text: It was narrated from Mu'adh bin Jabal that the :Messenger of Allah(ﷺ) said: "There is no soul that died bearing witness to La ilaha illallah, and that I am the Messenger of Allah, from the heart with certainity, but Allah will forgive it

chapter.ara-name: باب فَضْلِ لاَ إِلَهَ إِلاَّ اللَّهُ
chapter.eng-name: The Virtue of (saying) None has the right to be Worshipped but Allah
